newsitem.title: USA: Air Express opens five more China offices.
newsitem.headline: Air Express opens five more China offices.

text.p: Air Express International said that with the opening of five more offices in China this month and next, it will have a total of seven cities in that country.
The global freight forwarder said the new offices opening this months are in Tianjin, Guangzhou, Suzhou, and in Shanghai's Pudong. The office in Changchun opens next month.
All five offices will provide air and ocean services for both import and export traffic.
AEI also operates full-service offices in Shanghai and Beijing. -Air Cargo Newsroom Tel 44 171 542 8982 Fax +44 171 542 5017
